column4: hi!  I tried using the Places->Connect to server for the first time.  I can connect to my ftp server, but instead of opening a folder, it opens a tab in firefox.  Is there anyway I can open it as a folder to simplify transfering files?
it would be great to integrate ftp into the desktop
ty.  I can use a ftp client, i know, but i was hoping to integrate it into the desktop.  I assumed that was what places->connect to server was for, but i guess not.  fooey.
